## Usage Example

### Monolithic
python3 iotaDeployTool.py -uuid 1 -files application_ota.bin -type bin -version 86 -dateExpiration 2020-06-05 -debug true

#### With Authentication
python3 iotaDeployTool.py -uuid 1 -files application_ota.bin -type bin -version 94 -dateExpiration 2020-06-05 -debug true -authorPrivateKey 86730927cd290b2a1b7f78e4e12b8cc2b67c0ca7efa00b1c9cd1a7c9db46302f -projectPublicKey 

### Diferential
python3 iotaDeployTool.py -uuid 1 -files ../esp32/micropython/suit.py,../esp32/micropython/main.py -type py -version 90 -dateExpiration 2020-06-05 -debug true

#### With Authentication
python3 iotaDeployTool.py -uuid 1 -files ../esp32/micropython/suit.py,../esp32/micropython/main.py -type py -version 91 -dateExpiration 2020-06-05 -debug true -authorPrivateKey 86730927cd290b2a1b7f78e4e12b8cc2b67c0ca7efa00b1c9cd1a7c9db46302f -projectPublicKey
